title: Adspace
content:
Still in development any suggestions will help.

Adspace font
adspace.pdf (192.7 k)
author: njhamann

comments.content: I've always held a soft spot in my heart for dimensional display types such as this. The characters in this one are very similar to a slightly Smooshed

I am basing the design on Verdana Bold right now. I'm also expermenting with other font. Any good suggestions would be helpful.   
Thanks
